successes.title: OpenBCI: An Open Source Brain-Computer Interface For Makers
successes.description: A customizable and fully open brain-computer interface platform that gives you access to high-quality brain wave data.

Pledges.description: Show your support for the OpenBCI movement. Every little bit counts!
WOW! Thanks! We will send you a limited edition iron-on, embroidered OpenBCI patch! Only available through this Kickstarter!

Donate in honor of a loved one who suffers or suffered from a debilitating neurological or cognitive disorder. This could include: depression, anxiety, ADHD, dementia, addiction, paralysis, or any condition that can be linked to the brain. All people honored by this reward will forever be listed on our website and in the comments of the OpenBCI core code library.
You Rock! We will send you a super cool OpenBCI T-shirt! This limited edition design will only be available through the Kickstarter.

Choose this reward, and you will be amongst the first to receive an 8-channel OpenBCI EEG signal capture system. It will be bluetooth-enabled, Arduino-Compatible, and have an on-board SD card holder. Choose this reward if you have your own electrodes.
OpenBCI Board & Electrode Starter Kit [EARLY BIRD SPECIAL]

Choosing this reward, and you will be amongst the first to receive an 8-channel OpenBCI EEG signal capture system. It will be bluetooth-enabled, Arduino-Compatible, and have an on-board SD card holder. This reward comes with an electrode starter kit which includes 10 passive electrodes and conductive paste. With this reward you will have everything you need to get up and running right out of the box!

Receive an 8-channel OpenBCI EEG signal capture system. It will be bluetooth-enabled, Arduino-compatible, and have an on-board SD card holder. Choose this reward if you already have your own electrodes.

Bring OpenBCI into a classroom! Support brain science innovation in education and STEAM learning! Select this reward and we will donate an OpenBCI Board and an Electrode Starter Kit to a high school or university of your choice! You will be listed along with the school on our STEAM Sponsors page on our website.
